welcome_message: Hello! I am {{botName}}. How can I assist you?
Sure! Which government scheme are you in: Sure! Which government scheme are you interested in? Please provide the scheme name or a brief description.
Here are some of the latest schemes.
Here are some of the frequently asked qu: Here are some of the frequently asked questions
Let's start with the details.Your Gender: Let's start with the details.Your Gender
Let me gather the schemes for you.

faq.What can I do with this chatbot?: What can I do with this chatbot?
faq.You can use this chatbot to search for s: You can use this chatbot to search for specific government schemes by name, receive scheme suggestions based on your details (such as gender, age, community, and work category), and find out about the latest schemes available.
faq.How do I search for a specific scheme by: How do I search for a specific scheme by name?
faq.Simply type the name of the scheme you'r: Simply type the name of the scheme you're interested in, and the chatbot will provide you with detailed information about that scheme.
faq.Can I get scheme suggestions based on my: Can I get scheme suggestions based on my details?
faq.Yes, you can! Provide your gender, age,: Yes, you can! Provide your gender, age, community, and work category details when prompted, and the chatbot will recommend relevant schemes for you.
faq.How do I access the latest schemes?: How do I access the latest schemes?
faq.Choose the option to get the latest sche: Choose the option to get the latest schemes from the chatbot's menu, and it will provide you with information about the most recent government schemes available.
faq.What kind of details do I need to provid: What kind of details do I need to provide for scheme suggestions?
faq.For personalized scheme suggestions, ple: For personalized scheme suggestions, please provide your gender, age, community (if applicable), and your current work category or employment status.
faq.How accurate and up-to-date is the infor: How accurate and up-to-date is the information provided by the chatbot?
faq.The chatbot is designed to provide accur: The chatbot is designed to provide accurate and current information based on the latest available data about government schemes. However, it's recommended to verify details from official sources for critical decisions.
faq.Can I get information about eligibility: Can I get information about eligibility criteria for schemes?
faq.Yes, the chatbot can provide eligibility: Yes, the chatbot can provide eligibility criteria for specific schemes upon request.
faq.What if I encounter issues or need furth: What if I encounter issues or need further assistance?
faq.If you have any issues or need additiona: If you have any issues or need additional assistance, feel free to contact our support team [provide contact details or link to support].
faq.Is my personal information safe when int: Is my personal information safe when interacting with this chatbot?
faq.Yes, your privacy and personal informati: Yes, your privacy and personal information are important to us. We do not store or misuse any personal details provided during interactions.
faq.How do I start using the chatbot?: How do I start using the chatbot?
faq.Simply begin by selecting one of the ava: Simply begin by selecting one of the available options presented by the chatbot or type your query to get started.
faq.இந்த சாட்போட் மூலம் நான் என்ன செய்ய முடி: What can I do with this chatbot?
faq.இந்த சாட்போட்டைப் பயன்படுத்தி, குறிப்பிட: You can use this chatbot to search for specific government schemes by name, receive scheme suggestions based on your details (such as gender, age, community, and work category), and find out about the latest schemes available.
faq.ஒரு குறிப்பிட்ட திட்டத்தைப் பெயரால் நான்: How do I search for a specific scheme by name?
faq.நீங்கள் ஆர்வமாக உள்ள திட்டத்தின் பெயரை த: Simply type the name of the scheme you're interested in, and the chatbot will provide you with detailed information about that scheme.
faq.எனது விவரங்களின் அடிப்படையில் திட்டப் பர: Can I get scheme suggestions based on my details?
faq.ஆம், உங்களால் முடியும்! கேட்கும் போது உங: Yes, you can! Provide your gender, age, community, and work category details when prompted, and the chatbot will recommend relevant schemes for you.
faq.சமீபத்திய திட்டங்களை எவ்வாறு அணுகுவது?: How do I access the latest schemes?
faq.சாட்போட் மெனுவிலிருந்து சமீபத்திய திட்டங: Choose the option to get the latest schemes from the chatbot's menu, and it will provide you with information about the most recent government schemes available.
faq.திட்டப் பரிந்துரைகளுக்கு நான் என்ன வகையா: What kind of details do I need to provide for scheme suggestions?
faq.பரிந்துரை செய்யப்பட்ட திட்டங்களைப் பெற,: For personalized scheme suggestions, please provide your gender, age, community (if applicable), and your current work category or employment status.
faq.சாட்போட் வழங்கிய தகவல் எவ்வளவு துல்லியமா: How accurate and up-to-date is the information provided by the chatbot?
faq.அரசு திட்டங்களைப் பற்றிய சமீபத்திய தரவுக: The chatbot is designed to provide accurate and current information based on the latest available data about government schemes. However, it's recommended to verify details from official sources for critical decisions.
faq.திட்டங்களுக்கு உரிய தகுதி அளவுகோல்களை த: Can I get information about eligibility criteria for schemes?
faq.ஆம், chatbot குறிப்பிட்ட திட்டங்களுக்கு: Yes, the chatbot can provide eligibility criteria for specific schemes upon request.
faq.நான் சிக்கல்களை சந்தித்தால் அல்லது மேலும: What if I encounter issues or need further assistance?
faq.உங்களுக்கு ஏதேனும் சிக்கல்கள் இருந்தால்: If you have any issues or need additional assistance, feel free to contact our support team [provide contact details or link to support].
faq.இந்த chatbot உடன் தொடர்புகொள்கையில் என்: Is my personal information safe when interacting with this chatbot?
faq.ஆம், உங்கள் தனியுரிமை மற்றும் தனிப்பட்ட: Yes, your privacy and personal information are important to us. We do not store or misuse any personal details provided during interactions.
faq.நான் எப்படி சாட்போட்டைப் பயன்படுத்தத் தொ: How do I start using the chatbot?
faq.தயவுசெய்து chatbot க்கு வழங்கப்பட்ட விரு: Simply begin by selecting one of the available options presented by the chatbot or type your query to get started.

நிச்சயமாக! எந்த அரசாங்க திட்டத்தில் நீங்: Sure! Which government scheme are you interested in? Please provide the scheme name or a brief description.
Here are some of the latest schemes.
அடிக்கடி கேட்கப்படும் சில கேள்விகள் இவை: Here are some of the frequently asked questions
விவரங்களைப் பெறுவதில் இருந்து ஆரம்பிக்கல: Let's start with the details. Your Gender
உங்களுக்கான திட்டங்களை சேகரித்து பட்டியல: Let me gather the schemes for you.
